basicInfo.name: Rachel
basicInfo.flavor: After becoming the ruler of Blazing Desert, Rachel gave herself the title of Phoenix Incarnate. Lately, she's been troubled by people targeting the Blazing Desert.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - 40% chance to inflict Burn. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 120% of Physical Attack.
 - Increases Chance: Burn chance becomes 50%.

Skill 1.name: Blazing Strike
Skill 1.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 102% of Physical Attack 2 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict All Attack Reduction. [Duration: 5 Turn(s)]
 - 100% chance to inflict Damage Reduction [Duration: 5 Turn(s)]
 - 100% chance to inflict Burn. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 122% of Physical Attack.
超越6段階達成効果
 - Changes Number of Targets: To 3 Enemies

Skill 2.name: Phoenix Strike
Skill 2.desc:
3 Enemies
 - 100% chance to inflict Defense Reduction. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
 - 100% chance to inflict Physical Vulnerability. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
 - Deals damage equal to 160% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Effect: Defense Reduction to 36%.
 - Increases Effect: Physical Vulnerability to 28%.
超越2段階達成効果
 - Increases Turns: Inflicts Defense Reduction duration becomes 4 turn(s).
 - Increases Turns: Inflicts Physical Vulnerability duration becomes 4 turn(s).

Passive.name: Power of Flames
Passive.desc:
All Allies
 - Grants Weakness Hit Chance Boost. [Always Active]
 - Self
 - Revives with 80% HP upon falling in battle. [Once per Battle]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Effect: HP gained upon revival becomes 100%.
 - Increases Effect: Weakness Hit Chance Boost to 27%.

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: Rudy, pizza, beer, order, kindness, honor, cats, small birds, frogs
profile.dislikes: Dellons, lamb meat, chaos, evil, nasty behavior, dishonor, scorpions, cockroaches
profile.story: After becoming the ruler of Blazing Desert, Rachel gave herself the title of Phoenix Incarnate. Lately, she's been troubled by people targeting the Blazing Desert.

basicInfo.name: Rachel
basicInfo.flavor: Rachel became the Ruler of Flames of Blazing Desert by learning to control fire. She is considered the best, even within the Agni Family.

3 Enemies
 - 100% chance to inflict Defense Reduction. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]

 - Increases Damage: To 145% of Physical Attack.

basicInfo.name: Rachel
basicInfo.flavor: Rachel was born a noble, the eldest daughter of the Agni family. It is said that behind her graceful demeanor lies a blood-red flame.

 - 100% chance to inflict All Attack Reduction. [Duration: 5 Turn(s)]
 - 100% chance to inflict Damage Reduction [Duration: 5 Turn(s)]
 - 85% chance to inflict Burn. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 82% of Physical Attack.
